title: cafter
author: cafter
content: I will serve as an Assistant Manager for Signature And Bounty Managers, delivering unwavering dedication and ensuring 100% accuracyWhat Are My Responsibilities?I will vigilantly Count eligible posts of campaign's participants that are eligible for payment, I will verify if any participants are in violation of the rules, and Inform participants who have been accepted in the campaign but have not yet wore the avatar, personal text and signature. I will Keep Records of participants who have been accepted in campaign and left the campaign. Â What is Rates fo my service?For inquiries regarding rates and to discuss your budget, please reach out to me on Telegram at @brownricenet or through this link: https://t.me/brownricenet.
